title: Pearl barley, butternut squash and sage risotto
description: Pearl barley is much cheaper than traditional risotto rice and more flavoursome too. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.
ingredients: 800g-1kg/1lb 12oz-2lb 4oz butternut squash, peeled, seeds removed, diced
1 litre/1¾ pint vegetable stock (made from a stock cube)
2 sprigs sage, leaves picked and finely sliced
